official_title: To permit national banks to underwrite municipal revenue bonds.

summary.text: Amends Federal banking law to permit a national bank to deal in, underwrite, and purchase for its own account municipal revenue bonds (thus providing enhanced financial services for State and local governments).

titles.title: To permit national banks to underwrite municipal revenue bonds.
